projects.title: Wash Pilgrim Fathers Memorial
projects.desc: Birds have been excreeting a lot on the memorial, a days worth of good scrubbing should get it off.
projects.author: Alex Young

projects.title: Clean up Old Matey's Yard
projects.desc: Old Matey has a lot of old pipe and wood lying around in his front yard, it needs taking to 68 Wyberton Low Road.
projects.author: Matthew Hubbert

projects.title: Paint Fence at Care Home
projects.desc: The garden at the Care Home has a very weathered fence, it needs a new coat.
projects.author: Joe Standing

projects.title: Clean Stump Lights
projects.desc: The Stump parish needs to have the lights cleaned so it can shine brighter on Boston's landmark.
projects.author: Sam Young

projects.title: Fydell House Ashings
projects.desc: The resisdents of Fydell House range from light to heavy smokers, an area to dispose of cigarette buts is required outside the top flat.
projects.author: Stephan Furnell

projects.title: Sweep Brunel Concourse
projects.desc: Now that autumn is here, brunel needs a good sweep to get rid of those pesky leaves.
projects.author: Monil Santilal

projects.title: Trim Hedges of Park
projects.desc: The Council have gone on strike and we need to keep our park tidy, lets get trimming boys and girls.
projects.author: James A Clarke
